1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Umm Subyah Al-Juhaniyyah said:"Often my hand would touch the hand of the Messenger of Allah while performing ablution from a single vessel." (Hasan) Abu `Abdullah bin Majah said: "I heard Muhammad say: 'Umm Subyah was Khawlah bint Qais. I mentioned that to Abu Zur`ah and he said: "It is true

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ وَالْمَرْأَةِ يَتَوَضَّآنِ مِنْ إِنَاءٍ وَاحِدٍ
chapter.eng-name: A man and woman performing ablution from a single vessel
